features.title: Fiber To The Home
features.description: Experience blazing fast internet with our 100% fiber optic network directly to your home for unmatched speed and reliability.

features.title: 4K Viewing Experience
features.description: Stream your favorite content in stunning 4K Ultra HD quality without buffering or lag.

features.title: Unlimited Data
features.description: No FUP limits or data caps. Browse, stream, and download as much as you want without worrying.

features.title: Equal Upload & Download
features.description: Get symmetrical speeds for seamless video calls, file uploads, and cloud storage access.

features.title: Smart Router Included
features.description: Get a high-performance dual-band Wi-Fi router included with every plan for optimal coverage.

features.title: 24/7 Support
features.description: Our dedicated support team is available round the clock to assist you with any issues.
